name: magento-ai-toolkit-tests
description: Promptfoo test suite for magento-ai-toolkit skills and agents

scripts.test: npm run test:skills && npm run test:agents
scripts.test:skills: npx promptfoo@latest eval --config tests/skills/magento-plugin.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-db-schema.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-debug.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-observer.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-deploy.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-cli-command.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-test.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-api.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-hyva.yaml --config tests/skills/magento-infra.yaml --max-concurrency 2
scripts.test:agents: npx promptfoo@latest eval --config tests/agents/magento-bug-triage.yaml --config tests/agents/magento-code-review.yaml --config tests/agents/magento-deployment.yaml --config tests/agents/magento-performance-auditor.yaml --config tests/agents/magento-api-builder.yaml --config tests/agents/magento-module-generator.yaml --max-concurrency 1
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:skills -- --output results-skills.json && npm run test:agents -- --output results-agents.json
